import React, { Component } from 'react' import { register } from './UserFunctions' class Register extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { userName: '', department: '', emailID: '', password: '', role: 0, reportingManager: '', }; this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this) this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this) } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const newUser = { userName: this.state.userName, department: this.state.department, emailID: this.state.emailID, password: this.state.password, role: this.state.role, reportingManager: this.state.reportingManager, }; register(newUser).then(res => { this.props.history.push(`/login`) }) } render() { return (

Register

) } } export default Register
